display_long_description:
FIGHT with any weapon you can find against different enemies in the Hex7 Arenas. 
DEFEND yourself with shield and sword and don't forget to RELOAD your guns once in awhile.
                                                                                                                                                                       
[media]
SURVIVE the first 7 ROUNDS.
Have FUN customizing your game as much as you like.
[media]
EXPLORE the Arenas and enjoy the different game modes.
[media]
[media]
[media]
[media]
[media]
[media]
[media]
[media]
display_long_description_unprocessed:
FIGHT with any weapon you can find against different enemies in the Hex7 Arenas. 
DEFEND yourself with shield and sword and don't forget to RELOAD your guns once in awhile.
                                                                                                                                                                       
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent-fra3-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031640_1611492052972544_8434024045580790583_n.png?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=EniDrIB0WcsQ7kNvwFPmGqK&_nc_oc=AdkImGn-xeQIr91xDet3YquEFqvCKY7hk0L4TGmcA6XP5zhXE_tCXljZux-4X_nkzNw&_nc_zt=3&_nc_ht=scontent-fra3-2.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AfmCtE5xHsXWZJi-t8Ftgh9NyeQ3pDpyuSXwCYy1Lb88mA&oe=6958A10C)
SURVIVE the first 7 ROUNDS.
Have FUN customizing your game as much as you like.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39035393_1502492917145105_2500292279720560247_n.png?_nc_cat=110&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=rSt4q_Bme7QQ7kNvwEsfhSi&_nc_oc=Adn6u80qNaxPuWrgP0uAiS9G535Q4MqWAy5NXJ0_wuFLxxsJ7sX8sN-4oZukDLncdtk&_nc_zt=3&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AfnnVK0QEI8yJ3lFdT44VxmJrvrl8EY8Z-VT8kE2U8G0cQ&oe=69589F1F)
EXPLORE the Arenas and enjoy the different game modes.
